name: tag
description: Element tag to use for rendering the button

name: label
description: The text that will be shown on the button

name: icon
description: Material Icon name to use for the button. Icon is rendered using the "TIcon" component and will be placed at the start of the button content.

name: icon-size
description: Size of the icon to render.

name: icon-class
description: Class names to apply to the icon component

name: content-class
description: By default, the content of the button is wrapped by a div element. You can add your custom class through this property. This is ignored when using the default slot.

name: focus-class
description: The class applied to the FocusHelper component. FocusHelper, as name suggests, gives focus effect when element (in this case, the button) is in focus or is active.

name: ripple
description: Options used for the ripple directive. v-ripple. In most cases, you'll only need to modify the color key.

name: to
description: Converts the button to a "router-link" which in turn rendered as an anchor element. Uses object accepted by the "to" property of the "router-link" component
